subject: How to avoid running a test class multiple times

Subject: How to avoid running a test class multiple times

Is there a way to tell JUnit to execute a class only once no matter how man=
y times it appears in an invoked test suite?

E.g., say SomeTestClass.java =
is included in both test suite 'A'
 and test suite 'B'. But I have a higher=
-level suite call 'All' which includes both 'A' and 'B'. Running 'All' will=
 thus run SomeTestClass.java twice. Is there a way to prevent that?
